channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These stocks are likely to soar when the bull market rebounds
item.description: Stocks that lose the most often make a strong recovery once market liquidity returns.

item.title: CVS slashes profit outlook on higher medical costs, says top Aetna executive will leave
item.description: CVS said higher medical costs are weighing on its insurance business, and announced Aetna President Brian Kane will step down.

item.title: Disney beats estimates as combined streaming services turn a profit
item.description: Disney beat estimates as its combined streaming businesses ‚Äî Disney+, Hulu and ESPN+ ‚Äî turned a profit for the first time.

item.title: Nvidia‚Äôs stock offers ‚Äòtremendous opportunity‚Äô after selloff, this analyst says
item.description: Nvidia shares closed at $104.25 on Tuesday, well off their $135.58 closing high and $140.76 intraday high from June.

item.title: Treasury yields tick higher as global stocks continue rebound
item.description: Treasury yields were higher early Wednesday as global markets reversed course from Monday's equity sell-off.

item.title: Dow futures jump for a second day, up 300 points as Wall Street tries to recoup sell-off: Live updates
item.description: Stock futures popped after Wall Street snapped a three-day losing streak. Investors also looked to claw back more of the losses suffered earlier in the week.

item.title: America is suffering from deficit attention disorder
item.description: The U.S. deficit that matters most is government spending ‚Äî not trade ‚Äî and neither political party wants to talk about it.

item.title: Weekly mortgage refinance demand soars 16% as rates sink to lowest level in over a year
item.description: Mortgage interest rates dropped last week to the lowest level since May 2023, causing a surge in mortgage demand from both homebuyers and especially current homeowners.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares dip as Wegovy maker posts earnings miss, cuts operating profit outlook
item.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday announced its second quarter earnings for 2024.

item.title: This Wall Street firm had warned of a summer pullback. Now it has a shopping list, which includes Apple.
item.description: Citigroup warned of a summer pullback. Now that one arrived, it offers a list of stocks to buy.

item.title: Markets are counting on the Fed to head off recession with sizable interest rate cuts
item.description: How Chair Jerome Powell and his cohorts react likely will go a long way in determining how investors negotiate a turbulent climate.

item.title: DBS picks insider Tan Su Shan as first female CEO to succeed Piyush Gupta
item.description: DBS Group said on Wednesday that Tan Su Shan, the firm's head of institutional banking, will succeed Chief Executive Piyush Gupta upon his retirement in March.

item.title: The Fed appears to have finally created the recession it wanted
item.description: U.S. central bank engineers an economic slowdown whenever unemployment is low and the president is a Democrat.

item.title: Harris and Walz make Trump focus at Democratic ticket's first rally
item.description: Kamala Harris and Tim Walz are up against the Republican ticket of Donald Trump and Sen. JD Vance.

item.title: Markets are counting on the Fed to head off recession with sizable interest rate cuts
item.description: How Chair Jerome Powell and his cohorts react likely will go a long way in determining how investors negotiate a turbulent climate.
